title: Add home page links section, rename Mission tab, add delete functionality, and create Additional Resources tab

requirements.summary: Rename the 'Mission' navigation tab to 'Overview' throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu displays 'Overview' instead of 'Mission'
Tab routing continues to work correctly with the renamed tab
Active tab highlighting works for the Overview tab

file_operations.description: Update the navigation menu item label from 'Mission' to 'Overview'. Change the display text while keeping the value 'mission' for routing compatibility.
Update any UI labels or comments that reference 'Mission' to use 'Overview' instead. Ensure the tab value 'mission' is retained for routing.

requirements.summary: Add a new 'Additional Resources' tab to the navigation menu and create corresponding page component
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu includes 'Additional Resources' as a new tab option
Clicking the tab navigates to a new Additional Resources page
Page follows the existing design system and layout patterns

file_operations.description: Create a new page component for Additional Resources. Follow the layout pattern used in other pages (TrustedResources, CybercrimeAwareness) with a header section and content area. Include empty state placeholder content for the initial implementation.
Add a new menu item for 'Additional Resources' with value 'additional-resources'. Position it logically in the menu order, potentially after 'Resources' or at the end.
Wire the new Additional Resources tab into the tab routing logic. Import the AdditionalResources component and add a case for 'additional-resources' in the tab content rendering section.

requirements.summary: Add a section on the home page below the mission text for displaying links with thumbnails
acceptanceCriteria: New section appears below the mission content on the home page
Section displays links with associated thumbnail images
Links open in new tabs when clicked
Thumbnails are displayed in a responsive grid layout

file_operations.description: Create a new component to display home page links with thumbnails in a responsive grid. Use the backend getAllHomePageLinks query to fetch data. Display each link as a card with thumbnail image (using getDirectURL() from ExternalBlob), title, and clickable URL that opens in a new tab. Include loading skeletons and empty state. Follow the design pattern from LatestProgress and CybercrimeAwareness components for consistent styling.
Add useGetHomePageLinks query hook that calls backend.getAllHomePageLinks(). Follow the existing query pattern with proper logging and error handling.
Import and render the HomePageLinks component below the MissionPage component when the 'mission' (Overview) tab is active. Position it to appear below the mission text content.

requirements.summary: Add dialog component for creating and editing home page links with thumbnail upload
acceptanceCriteria: Dialog allows input of link title and URL
Thumbnail image upload with progress tracking using ExternalBlob pattern
Form validation for required fields
Success and error toast notifications on save

file_operations.description: Create a dialog component for adding home page links. Include form fields for title (text input) and URL (text input with URL validation), plus thumbnail image file upload. Use ExternalBlob.fromBytes() with withUploadProgress() for upload tracking. Follow the pattern from AddArticleDialog.tsx. Display upload percentage during file upload. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dialog component for editing existing home page links. Pre-populate form with current title, URL, and thumbnail. Allow optional thumbnail replacement. Use ExternalBlob upload pattern with progress tracking. Follow the pattern from EditArticleDialog.tsx. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add useAddHomePageLink mutation hook that calls backend.addHomePageLink(title, url, thumbnail). Add useUpdateHomePageLink mutation hook that calls backend.updateHomePageLink(id, title, url, thumbnail). Both should invalidate the home page links query on success and show toast notifications. Follow existing mutation patterns.
Wire in the Add and Edit dialogs. Add a button to open AddHomePageLinkDialog. Add edit button/icon on each link card that opens EditHomePageLinkDialog with the selected link data.

requirements.summary: Add delete button and functionality to all article posts in Latest Progress section
acceptanceCriteria: Delete button visible on each article card
Clicking delete shows confirmation dialog
Successfully deleted articles are removed from the list
Backend deleteArticle function implemented and working

file_operations.description: Add useDeleteArticle mutation hook that calls backend.deleteArticle(id). Invalidate articles query on success and show toast notification. Follow existing mutation patterns with comprehensive logging.

Add a delete button to each article card. When clicked, show a confirmation dialog (using AlertDialog from shadcn/ui) asking for confirmation. On confirm, call the useDeleteArticle mutation with the article ID. Show loading state during deletion.
